entry.title: Webscraping by Example: An introduction to BeautifulSoup
entry.summary:
Description

This is a basic tutorial on the various features of the popular html parser BeautifulSoup. In this tutorial, we will cover the basic functions and data structures that make up the BeautifulSoup package. We will utilize this knowledge as we automate some data extraction tasks on the Buildings Information â€¦
entry.content:
Description

This is a basic tutorial on the various features of the popular html parser BeautifulSoup. In this tutorial, we will cover the basic functions and data structures that make up the BeautifulSoup package. We will utilize this knowledge as we automate some data extraction tasks on the Buildings Information System (BIS) published by the New York City Department of Buildings.
